attributes.action: Ask Stratford-on-Avon District Council to reconsider the ban on alcohol in the Global Gathering Campsite
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Its written as part of the licence of Global Gathering Festival at Long Marston Airfield, that no alcohol can be taken into the event site. All other major festivals allow alcohol to be taken into the campsite, but not the area where the music is. I petition the government to intervene and allow the customers of Global Gathering a level playing field with customers of all other major festivals. 

In times of a recession its madness that people camping have to pay over inflated prices for alcohol, or even water and soft drinks at a festival. 

All we ask is that we can take a reasonable amount of alcohol into the campsite, so that we can enjoy the festival without spending hundreds upon hundreds of pounds each once we arrive.
